scripts.pm2:start:router: npx pm2 start --name noderouter --namespace noderouter src/router
scripts.pm2:start:client: npx pm2 start --name noderouter-client --namespace noderouter src/client/run
scripts.docker:build:router: docker build -t drassil/noderouter -f NR.Dockerfile . && docker tag drassil/noderouter drassil/noderouter:latest
scripts.docker:build:client: docker build -t drassil/noderouter-client -f NRClient.Dockerfile . && docker tag drassil/noderouter-client drassil/noderouter-client:latest
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:push:client && npm run docker:push:router
scripts.docker:push:router: npm run docker:build:router && docker push drassil/noderouter:latest
scripts.docker:push:client: npm run docker:build:client && docker push drassil/noderouter-client:latest
